question: Tell me about a time when you had to explain a complex statistical concept to a non-technical stakeholder.
How would you design an A/B test to measure the impact of a new feature?
Explain the bias-variance tradeoff and how it relates to model performance.
Walk me through how you would build a recommendation system for an e-commerce platform.
How do you handle imbalanced datasets in classification problems?
What metrics would you use to evaluate a regression model?
Describe a time when your model performed poorly in production. What did you do?
How would you detect and handle outliers in a dataset?
Explain the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning with examples.
How would you approach feature engineering for a time series forecasting problem?
